select ls.id, user_id AS userId, ls.name, ls.contact_phone AS contactPhone, ls.sex, photo_url AS photoUrl, lcs.clazz_id AS clazzId,lc.name AS clazzName,pp.id AS packId,pp.name AS packName, pps.remaining_hour AS remainHour from less_student ls LEFT JOIN less_clazz_student lcs on lcs.student_id=ls.id
JOIN less_clazz lc ON lcs.clazz_id=lc.id
LEFT JOIN pack_package_student pps on pps.student_id=ls.id
LEFT JOIN pack_package pp ON pp.id=pps.package_id
AND ls.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))
AND lc.id = clazzId
order by id ASC ;
